LUKE 1.21 jah was managei beidandans Zakariins, jah sildaleikidedun ƕa latidedi ina in þizai alh.
LUKE 1.22 usgaggands þan ni mahta du im rodjan, jah froþun þammei siun gasaƕ in alh;
jah silba was bandwjands im jah gawas dumbs.
LUKE 1.23 jah warþ, biþe usfullnodedun dagos andbahteis is, galaiþ du garda seinamma.
LUKE 1.24 afaruh þan þans dagans inkilþo warþ Aileisabaiþ qens is jah galaugnida sik menoþs fimf, qiþandei: LUKE 1.25 þatei
swa mis gatawida frauja in dagam þaimei insaƕ afniman idweit mein in mannam.

LUKE 1.26 þanuh þan in menoþ saihstin insandiþs was aggilus Gabriel fram guda in baurg Galeilaias sei haitada Nazaraiþ, LUKE 1.27 du magaþai in fragibtim abin, þizei namo Iosef, us garda Daweidis, jah namo þizos magaþais Mariam.
LUKE 1.28 jah galeiþands inn sa aggilus du izai qaþ:
fagino,
anstai audahafta, frauja miþ þus;
þiuþido þu in qinom.
LUKE 1.29 iþ si gasaiƕandei gaþlahsnoda bi innatgahtai is jah þahta sis ƕeleika wesi so goleins .
LUKE 1.30 jah qaþ aggilus du izai:
ni ogs þus,
Mariam, bigast auk anst fram guda.
LUKE 1.31 jah sai, ganimis in kilþein jah gabairis sunu jah haitais namo is Iesu.
LUKE 1.32 sah wairþiþ mikils jah sunus hauhistins haitada, jah gibid imma frauja guþ stol Daweidis attins is.
LUKE 1.33 jah þiudanoþ ufar garda Iakobis in ajukduþ, jah þiudinassaus is ni wairþiþ andeis.
LUKE 1.34 qaþ þan Mariam du þamma aggilau:
ƕaiwa sijai þata, þandei aban ni kann?
LUKE 1.35 jah andhafjands sa aggilus qaþ du izai:
ahma weihs atgaggiþ ana þuk, jah mahts hauhistins ufarskadweid þus, duþe ei jah saei gabairada weihs haitada sunus gudis.
LUKE 1.36 jah sai, Aileisabaiþ niþjo þeina, jah so inkilþo sunau in aldomin seinamma, jah sa menoþs saihsta ist izai sei haitada stairo, LUKE 1.37 unte nist unmahteig guda ainhun waurde.
LUKE 1.38 qaþ þan Mariam:
sai, þiwi fraujins,
wairþai mis bi waurda þeinamma.
jah galaiþ fairra izai sa aggilus.
LUKE 1.39 usstandandei þan Mariam in þaim dagam iddja in bairgahein sniumundo in baurg Iudins, LUKE 1.40 jah galaiþ in gard Zakariins jah golida Aileisabaiþ.
LUKE 1.41 jah warþ, swe hausida Aileisabaiþ golein Mariins, lailaik barn in qiþau izos, jah gafullnoda ahmins weihis Aileisabaiþ, LUKE 1.42 jah ufwopida stibnai mikilai jah qaþ:
þiuþido þu in qinom, jah þiuþido akran qiþaus þeinis.
LUKE 1.43 jah ƕaþro mis þata, ei qemi aiþei fraujins meinis at mis?
LUKE 1.44 sai allis, sunsei warþ stibna goleinais þeinaizos in ausam meinaim, lailaik þata barn in swigniþai in wambai meinai.
LUKE 1.45 jah audaga so galaubjandei þatei wairþiþ ustauhts þize rodidane izai fram fraujin.
LUKE 1.46 jah qaþ Mariam:
mikileid saiwala meina fraujan, LUKE 1.47 jah swegneid ahma meins du guda nasjand meinamma.
LUKE 1.48 unte insaƕ du hnaiweinai þiujos seinaizos;
sai allis, fram himma nu audagjand mik alla kunja.
LUKE 1.49 unte gatawida mis mikilein sa mahteiga, jah weih namo is.
LUKE 1.50 jah armahairtei is in aldins alde þaim ogandam ina.
LUKE 1.51 gatawida swinþein in arma seinamma,
distahida mikilþuhtans gahugdai hairtins seinis;
LUKE 1.52 gadrausida mahteigans af stolam jah ushauhida gahnaiwidans;
LUKE 1.53 gredagans gasoþida þiuþe jah gabignandans insandida lausans.
LUKE 1.54 hleibida Israela þiumagu seinamma, gamunands armahairteins, LUKE 1.55 swaswe rodida du attam unsaraim Abrahama jah fraiwa is und aiw.
LUKE 1.56 gastoþ þan Mariam miþ izai swe menoþs þrins jah gawandida sik du garda seinamma.
